page.title: 15PINK COTTAGE FOXES
page.content: Five years ago, the lady of Copford Pink Cottage took home a{fox cub}and hand reared it. The{vixen}was friendly and when older was put in a small run with a hut with earth to dig and scratch in. It escaped on occasions but always returned. After a long disappearence, it must have mated for it returned and each night took lots of food and eventually brought some cubs for the lady to see. It returned to nature and was killed by a dog. Since then she has kept two other cubs, one of which liked to play with her dogs although it was never domesticated. The{local hunt}meets at the Alma pub nearby and the lady deliberately puts them off the scent with her "special potion"
